summary: Three fellows are gaining money by faking that they are Gashte Ershad (a special police for arresting guys and girls that wear clothes in a bad way).
cast: Hamid Farokhnezhad|Poulad Kimiayi|Saed Soheili|Jamshid Hashempur|Niousha Zeighami|Sahar Ghoreishi|Nasser Gitijah|Mir Taher Mazloomi|Alireza Abbasi|Rebecca Ghaderi|Giti Moeeni|Pourya Partovizadeh|Asghar Semsarzade|Sara Soheili
title: Gasht-e ershad
